      • addUser

        public void addUser​(char type,
                    String document,
                    String name,
                    String lastName,
                    String phone)
             throws customExceptions.UserAlreadyExistsException
        Name: addUser.
        This method adds an user to the ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        type - the document type.
        document - the document number.
        name - the name of the new user
        lastName - the last name of the new user.
        phone - the phone of the user.
        Throws:
        customExceptions.UserAlreadyExistsException - if an user exists already in the ArrayList

      • searchUser

        public String searchUser​(String document)
                  throws customExceptions.UserNotFoundException
        Name: searchUser.
        This method searches an user on the ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        document - the document number.
        Returns:
        a toString method of user with all the given information at the time of creation
        Throws:
        customExceptions.UserNotFoundException - if the user does not exist in the ArrayList

      • assignTurn

        public String assignTurn​(String document,
                         TurnType z)
                  throws customExceptions.UserNotFoundException,
                         customExceptions.UserAlreadyWithTurnException,
                         customExceptions.TurnTypeNotFoundException,
                         customExceptions.UserIsSuspendedException
        Name: assignTurn.
        This method assigns a turn to an already existing user.
        Parameters:
        document - the document number.
        turnType - the type of the turn to assign
        Returns:
        b message showing what turn was assigned
        Throws:
        customExceptions.UserNotFoundException - if the user does not exist in the ArrayList
        customExceptions.UserAlreadyWithTurnException - if the user already has a turn assigned
        customExceptions.TurnTypeNotFoundException
        customExceptions.UserIsSuspendedException - When the user has been suspended for not arriving to two dates

      • searchTurnType

        public TurnType searchTurnType​(String type)
        Name: searchTurnType.
        This method searches if the given type of a turn exists.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the turn.
        Returns:
        a memory value of the instance of TurnType if found, null if not

      • attend

        public String attend()
        Name: attend.
        This method attends users that have asked for a turn in a given time frame, meaning, if the system's date is able to fit in the time for them to be attended it does so
        Returns:
        a message showing the name of the turn that was attended

      • advanceTurn

        public void advanceTurn()
        Name: advanceTurns.
        This method advances turns.

      • setCurrentTurn

        public void setCurrentTurn​(int leftNum,
                           int rightNum,
                           int currLett)
        Name: setCurrentTurn.
        This method sets the current turn with help of advance turn, its a auxiliary method.
        Parameters:
        leftNum - the left number in the turn's name
        rightNum - the right number in the turn's name
        currLett - the current letter to be assigned to the turn's name

      • getSystemTime

        public String getSystemTime()
        Name: getSystemTime.
        This method fetches the current time on the system, the one given by the user if he changed the hour, or the real time given by calendar.
        Returns:
        a system's time

      • setSystemTime

        public String setSystemTime​(int year,
                            int month,
                            int day,
                            int hour,
                            int minute,
                            int seconds)
        Name: setSystemTime.
        This method sets the time on the program to one given by the user.
        Parameters:
        year - integer with the year to be set
        month - integer with the month to be set
        day - integer with the day to be set
        hour - integer with the hour to be set
        minute - integer with the minute to be set
        seconds - integer with the seconds to be set
        Returns:
        a system time as given by the method "getSystemTime"

      • setSystemTime

        public String setSystemTime​(boolean currentDate)
        Name: setSystemTime.
        This method sets the time on the program to the computer's.
        Parameters:
        currentDate - a boolean signaling that the user wants for the date to be the same as the computer's
        Returns:
        a system's time as given by the method "getSystemTime"

      • reportAttendedTurns

        public String reportAttendedTurns​(String document,
                                  boolean choice)
                           throws FileNotFoundException
        Name: reportAttendedTurns.
        This method writes a report about the turns that have been attended, saving them in a file if the user chooses to.
        Parameters:
        document - the number of the document of the user
        choice - the choice value of the user when asked if they want to save the data in a file
        Returns:
        a attended turns of the given user
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

      • reportSameTurn

        public String reportSameTurn​(String turnNumber)
        Name: reportSameTurn.
        This method reports the turns that have been repeated by several users.
        Parameters:
        turnNumber - the turn number to be searched
        Returns:
        a either the name of the users that have had the same turn or a String saying that no user was found with that turn (or has been attended yet)

      • generateRandomTurns

        public void generateRandomTurns​(int turnAmount)
                         throws customExceptions.MoreTurnsThanUsersException,
                                customExceptions.UserNotFoundException,
                                customExceptions.UserAlreadyWithTurnException,
                                customExceptions.TurnTypeNotFoundException,
                                customExceptions.UserIsSuspendedException
        Name: generateRandomTurns.
        This method generates random turns to the users in the ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        turnAmount - the amount of turns to be created, cannot exceed the amount of users currently registered
        Throws:
        customExceptions.MoreTurnsThanUsersException
        customExceptions.UserNotFoundException
        customExceptions.UserAlreadyWithTurnException
        customExceptions.TurnTypeNotFoundException
        customExceptions.UserIsSuspendedException
